io.name: SARSFNDX0020101_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:SARSFNDX0020101_inbound" /> <complexType name="SARSFNDX0020101_inbound"> <sequence> <element name="crdMemNo"> <annotation> <documentation>카드회원번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="9" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="utlzGbcd"> <annotation> <documentation>이용구분코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

io.name: SARSFNDX0020101_OUTBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:SARSFNDX0020101_outbound" /> <complexType name="SARSFNDX0020101_outbound"> <sequence> <element name="rstRowcount"> <annotation> <documentation>결과List_배열건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="5" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="rstList" type="tns:RST_LIST_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>결과List_배열</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="RST_ROWCOUNT" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="RST_LIST_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="sendDt"> <annotation> <documentation>전송일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="sendTime"> <annotation> <documentation>전송시간</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="respCd"> <annotation> <documentation>응답코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="4" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="crdMemNo"> <annotation> <documentation>카드회원번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="9" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="utlzGbcd"> <annotation> <documentation>이용구분코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="chrDt"> <annotation> <documentation>청구일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="stlmCnt"> <annotation> <documentation>결제건수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="3" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="totStlmAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>총결제금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="22" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="saleDt"> <annotation> <documentation>매출일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="itemNm"> <annotation> <documentation>상품명</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="60" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="saleAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>매출금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="22" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="insmMths"> <annotation> <documentation>할부개월수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="reqTmnm"> <annotation> <documentation>청구회차</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="thmnReqAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>당월청구금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="22" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
